directions: Place bulgur in a casserole dish, and cover it with 3 cups boiling water. Cover.  Let stand 30 minutes, or until the water has been absorbed.

Fluff bulgur with a fork. Add tomatoes, parsley, green onions, mint, olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper; stir to combine.  Cover, and refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours.  Serve either chilled or at room temperature.
ingredients: ¼ cup minced fresh mint leaves
title: Tabbouleh
